CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 9, 1946, pg. 17, reads: "Love - Eurylee Leonardis [Urylee Leonardos] and Kenneth Bacon of the "Carmen Jones" show applied for a marriage license here Monday. Miss Leonardis [sic] is understudy for the leading role of Carmen. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Actors Urylee Leonardos and Kenneth Bacon embracing backstage of "Carmen Jones" set, Nixon Theatre
